mapper.delete: delete from pz_dictionary_type where pz_dictionary_type.type_id = #{value} and pz_dictionary_type.type_id not in (select pz_dictionary.type_id from pz_dictionary where pz_dictionary.type_id = pz_dictionary_type.type_id)
mapper.select: select a.`dict_id`,a.`dict_name`,a.`dict_value`,a.`dict_desc`,a.`dict_sort`,a.`del_flag`,a.`remarks`,a.`parent_id`,a.`type_id`,a.`create_time`,a.`update_time`,a.`create_by_id`,a.`update_by_id`,a.`create_by`,a.`update_by` from pz_dictionary as a inner join pz_dictionary_type as b on a.type_id = b.type_id and b.type_name = #{value} and a.del_flag = '0' order by a.dict_sort asc
